name: thom-aws-auth
description: lambda functions for auth with dynamodb

scripts.setup: npm i && cd src/layers/nodejs && npm i
scripts.apply:aws: npm run build && cd terraform/aws && terraform plan -out=out.tfplan -var-file=secrets.tfvars && terraform apply "out.tfplan"
scripts.apply:local: npm run build && cd terraform/localstack && terraform init && terraform plan -out=out.tfplan -var-file=secrets.tfvars && terraform apply "out.tfplan"
scripts.up: cd terraform/docker && terraform init && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.create:local-lambdas: rm -rf temp && mkdir temp && npm run merge:packages && npm run copy:lambdas && npm run copy:esbuild && npm run update:esbuild-local && cd temp && npm i --omit=dev && npm run build

author: Thomas Newman
